001package org.jfree.chart.renderer;
002
003
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.io.Serializable;
006
007public class AbstractRendererProduct2 implements Serializable, Cloneable {
008        private Map<Integer, Boolean> seriesVisibleInLegendMap;
009        private boolean defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend;
010
011        public Map<Integer, Boolean> getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap() {
012                return seriesVisibleInLegendMap;
013        }
014
015        public void setSeriesVisibleInLegendMap(Map<Integer, Boolean> seriesVisibleInLegendMap) {
016                this.seriesVisibleInLegendMap = seriesVisibleInLegendMap;
017        }
018
019        public boolean getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend() {
020                return defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend;
021        }
022
023        public void setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend2(boolean defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend) {
024                this.defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend = defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend;
025        }
026
027        /**
028        * Returns  {@code  true}  if the series should be shown in the legend, and  {@code  false}  otherwise.
029        * @param series   the series index.
030        * @return  A boolean.
031        */
032        public boolean isSeriesVisibleInLegend(int series) {
033                boolean result = this.defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend;
034                Boolean b = this.seriesVisibleInLegendMap.get(series);
035                if (b != null) {
036                        result = b;
037                }
038                return result;
039        }
040
041        /**
042        * Sets the default visibility in the legend and, if requested, sends a  {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
043        * @param visible   the visibility.
044        * @param notify   notify listeners?
045        * @see #getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend()
046        */
047        public void setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend(boolean visible, boolean notify, AbstractRenderer abstractRenderer) {
048                this.defaultSeriesVisibleInLegend = visible;
049                if (notify) {
050                        abstractRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
051                }
052        }
053
054        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
055                return (AbstractRendererProduct2) super.clone();
056        }
057}
